title: Main Hacked =[ Does support tickets usually get replied through email or through the ticket page?
body:
Recently my main Nebu ( http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=n%C3%ABbu) was hacked.
 I cannot change the pass due to me not knowing the password of the linked email
I sent in a ticket http://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/25153524 but when i click on it it just sends me to a logging page and then error after?
I was wondering do riot support reply through email or through the link above ?
For that rioter that helped me in the first thread.. srry if i had to posted it again Hacker deleted my other one.. 
Thanks again

replies.body:
Account recovery tickets specifically are dealt with entirely over email from your end. You can find the proper form for the ticket you're trying to submit [**HERE**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K).

Let me know if you have any other questions.
